title: 1.1 Master Challenge 1
question: You found something at the beach in the morning. Create a flowchart to determine whether that thing is living or non-living. Hint: Think about the properties of living things such as growth, breathing, movement and so on

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
